data.name: Escape From Dungeon
data.description:
· In Escape From Dungeon you're one of heros who are sent to save the village. You are required to choose a proper roadmap from 30 different types of dungeons, and take the big boss down in the final level!
· Each adventure experience is different based on your option. Multiple choices of weapons and interactive traps are waiting for you.
· Player Number: 1 Player
· Standing Mode: Stand & play, no space requirement at all.
· Walking Mode: 1 player explore every unexpected dungeon free-roaming in a 4x8m space. You need to dodge attacks and find a proper angle to shoot down the monsters. 
· Features: Shift of multiple weapons brings you totally different free-roaming fight experience, intensive hit feedback + funny monster AI design, allows every player forget reality and totally being highly engaged in the adventure.
· Built-in level system, experience random 10 dungeons each adventure, feel more excitement & face more challenge combination each adventure! High playability!
